idea:
Stake Exchange is launched with a basic idea to create an online social platform with business in mind. While there are many online social and professional networks, we realized that there is no such online network available in the market with free access to public to join, collaborate and leverage on each other's strengths to foster business relations.

 It allows anyone and everyone to join the network and create business profile so that users can leverage the network to search and find opportunities. Opportunities could be in the form of finding investors, investees, partners, self promotion for existing business, freelancing opportunity, providing services, sharing ideas and so on.

The power of our idea originated from the fact that in the world of internet, everyone who has a dream of business, should have an equal opportunity and access to become an entrepreneur. Therefore our mantra 'Join Hands - Grow together.
name: Stake-Exchange

idea:
Gasgrows Solution Pvt. Ltd.is founded by experienced team with proven track record to venture into India’s fast growing gas economy. It was incorporated as a Private Limited Company under the Indian Companies Act 1956 (No. 1 of 1956) on 27th March 2019 with an objective of venturing into the area of Small Scale LNG (ssLNG) providing faster, safer, and cheaper LNG solutions across the value chain including Procurement, Transportation, Storage and Regasifiaction for usage of  ‘LNG as Fuel’ and ‘LNG as Power’. It is a registered MSME under MSME Udyog Aadhar.  Gasgrows intends to distribute LNG in a more competitive and efficient way than conventional pipelines. Gasgrows offers the most competitive LNG price available, since the company is able to tap into multiple LNG terminals, and distribute LNG via LNG Semitrailers.  


Gasgrows makes clean LNG readily available for communities eager to replace the traditional fuels like Diesel, Furnace Oil, LPG, Naphtha etc. Due to the solid experience and reputation of the founders of the company, leading LNG Terminals and Suppliers have already signed Fuel Supply Agreements (FSA) with the company.

Currently, many companies are ready to avail the services of transportation of LNG from various LNG terminals (Ports) namely Petronet at Dahej, Gujarat; Petronet at Kochi, Kerala, Shell at Hazira, Gujarat and IOCL at Ennore, Tamilnadu. The company has plans to supply and move 30,000 metric tons (MT) of LNG in FY 2021-22. Gasgrows has partnered with terminal and best technology companies working in the area of LNG and power generation to bring the most advanced solutions to India in the most cost-effective manner. Indian Oil Corporation Ltd. (IOCL), Shell Energy India Ltd and Petronet LNG are ready to provide us more clients based on the number of tankers we own.
name: GASGROWS SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
